name: Roy Peet
description:
Edit: So apparently the game crashes when you try to load a level. Which, well I'm not surprised but I am a bit disappointed. Once the ratings are over I'm gonna post a fixed version if anyone has any interest in playing it.

This is my first time participating in a Game Jam (Brackeys2020.2) an I enjoyed it! My game is bad and unpolished but for my first original game, I'm proud of it sort of. No real theme, hardly any sound, only a small understanding of game design, but it is  something,  and I get to say I made a game in one week. Even if I get one comment or piece of feedback I will be amazed it and if not, I still think it was worth it.

Anyways I also included an Easter egg in each level except for the tutorial and one if you get a certain overall score percent if you are into that.
